ticket.title: RFC-0029 REQ-0003 verification amortization and proof-cache discipline

tickets.reason: Amortization policy depends on deterministic digest-first selector and replay semantics.

in_scope: Implement bounded proof-cache reuse and batching for correlated verification workloads.
Implement cache invalidation preserving freshness and revocation correctness.
Measure and report sub-linear verifier workload growth for declared workload classes.
Emit deny behavior for stale-cache and unresolved cache-binding states.
out_of_scope: Queue lane admission and anti-starvation policy.

steps: Define proof-cache reuse/invalidation contract and deny classes.
Implement workload instrumentation for amortized verification growth.
Add stale-cache and revocation-race negative test fixtures.
Add benchmark and conformance evidence extraction for verifier economics.

criteria: Proof-cache reuse is bounded and policy-gated.
Invalidation paths preserve revocation and freshness correctness.
Evidence demonstrates targeted sub-linear verifier workload growth.

notes.security: Cache artifacts must not bypass revocation or freshness constraints.
notes.verification: Include negatives proving stale-cache conditions deny deterministically.
notes.general: This ticket closes REQ-0003 verification amortization obligations.
